name: but-engineering-tier4-eval
description: Tier 4 integration evaluation harness for but-engineering coordination behavior

scripts.eval: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml
scripts.eval:fast: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && BUT_EVAL_MAX_TURNS=12 BUT_EVAL_RUNNER_RETRIES=0 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml
scripts.eval:repeat: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml --repeat 3
scripts.eval:natural: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.natural.yaml
scripts.eval:natural:fast: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && BUT_EVAL_MAX_TURNS=12 BUT_EVAL_RUNNER_RETRIES=0 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.natural.yaml
scripts.eval:natural:repeat: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && mkdir -p output && PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.natural.yaml --repeat 10 -o output/natural-repeat.json
scripts.eval:natural:metrics: sh -c 'pnpm run eval:natural:repeat || true; node dist/scripts/natural-metrics.js output/natural-repeat.json --threshold 0.7'
scripts.eval:natural:diagnose: sh -c 'pnpm run eval:natural:repeat || true; node dist/scripts/natural-metrics.js output/natural-repeat.json --threshold 0.7; node dist/scripts/natural-failures.js output/natural-repeat.json'
scripts.eval:natural:codex: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && BUT_EVAL_AGENT=codex BUT_EVAL_RUNNER=providers/codex-local.sh BUT_EVAL_RUNNER_BIN=codex BUT_EVAL_MODEL=${BUT_EVAL_MODEL:-gpt-5-codex} PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.natural.yaml
scripts.eval:natural:codex:repeat: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && mkdir -p output && BUT_EVAL_AGENT=codex BUT_EVAL_RUNNER=providers/codex-local.sh BUT_EVAL_RUNNER_BIN=codex BUT_EVAL_MODEL=${BUT_EVAL_MODEL:-gpt-5-codex} PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.natural.yaml --repeat 10 -o output/natural-codex-repeat.json
scripts.eval:composite: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.composite.yaml
scripts.eval:composite:fast: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && BUT_EVAL_MAX_TURNS=12 BUT_EVAL_RUNNER_RETRIES=0 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.composite.yaml
scripts.eval:composite:repeat: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && mkdir -p output && PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.composite.yaml --repeat 10 -o output/composite-repeat.json
scripts.eval:composite:metrics: sh -c 'pnpm run eval:composite:repeat || true; node dist/scripts/natural-metrics.js output/composite-repeat.json --threshold 0.6'
scripts.eval:composite:diagnose: sh -c 'pnpm run eval:composite:repeat || true; node dist/scripts/natural-metrics.js output/composite-repeat.json --threshold 0.6; node dist/scripts/natural-failures.js output/composite-repeat.json --scenario composite'
scripts.eval:codex: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && BUT_EVAL_AGENT=codex BUT_EVAL_RUNNER=providers/codex-local.sh BUT_EVAL_RUNNER_BIN=codex BUT_EVAL_MODEL=${BUT_EVAL_MODEL:-gpt-5-codex} PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml
scripts.eval:codex:repeat: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but-engineering --manifest-path ../../../Cargo.toml && BUT_EVAL_AGENT=codex BUT_EVAL_RUNNER=providers/codex-local.sh BUT_EVAL_RUNNER_BIN=codex BUT_EVAL_MODEL=${BUT_EVAL_MODEL:-gpt-5-codex} PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 PROMPTFOO_DISABLE_UPDATE=1 promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml --repeat 3
